comments: Straight forward teacher. Didnt go to class that much and recieved an A. 3 test and 4 essays. Got the book but didnt look at it at all! Memorize study guide and recieve A on test. Easy!

Professor Levy is an interesting man, he is very helpful and very clear in what he wants you to achieve in his class. I highly recommend him. Homework is pretty straight forward and easy and the tests are very easy if you attend the study groups in class the week before the next test.
This professor is very straight forward with information and super laid back. HIGHLY recommended.

Professor Levy is an excellent professor. He\'s energetic and makes learning easy and interesting. Time flew by in his classes. He wants everyone to pass and provides students with everything they need to do so. There were 4 papers and three tests. He gave us study groups and study guides for the tests so we were fully prepared.

You won\'t get an overwhelming amount of work in this class. Yet, Prof. Levy expects you to learn the information and use it in the classes three papers and three test. All in all I enjoyed this class.

I am in his class and I am not the brightest bulb in the class, however in this class I learn tons and I genuinely have an interest in this class, its fun and he makes it very interesting. No other class has my attention like he does. I want to continue to take more of his courses. However doesnt go to my degree, was fun. ciao

Great teacher, fun class. Just show up and do the work and you\'ll receive an A. There\'s only 3 tests in the entire semester and he prints a study guide for each one. I highly recommend this teacher and class for anyone interested in psychology.

His psy A150 class was interesting at times and boring at times (but that\'s college). He doesn\'t overload you with work which allows breathing room for your other classes. I\'d probably take another one of his classes because I did get some valuable info that actually stuck.

Professor Levy is an energetic man who tries to make learning as interesting as possible. Other than a few students who kept interrupting him, I enjoyed his class! He has the students write four essays and take three tests. The tests pull questions directly from the study guide so you know what will be on them. Highly recommend taking his class!

Other than a couple of students that I felt might have intentionaly degress from the topics we were learning, I felt he was very fair in answering our questions.He is knowledgable in the subject at hand and made many of the topics interesting and fun to learn. I realy enjoyed his class and found myself wanting to learn more. Great job!

GREAT TEACHER!!! Very easy going, gives word for word question study guides to each test, only 3 tests and 3 assignments in the entire semester! Just show up for the class ready to take notes and everything else is easy from there on out. HIGHLY recommend this teacher.

Prof. Levy is one of my favorite professors ever. He is very smart and kept me engaged in the topics. If you do the work to the best of your ability then you should get an A. The subject were interesting, the papers were pretty cool topics and the tests weren\'t 2 hard as long as you did the study guide and studied it. I wish he taught more classes!

I really don\'t like his style of teaching. He rambles on about topics that aren\'t relivent to the class. For example, he talked about how to do a reference section for 45 minutes! Something that should of been covered in English 111. I\'m sorry, but I like structure in class. I like learning about the subject I\'m paying for.
Good teacher. Pretty interesting class. He requires several papers that he grades very easily, and he provides a review for the tests that make it almost impossible to not get an A in the class.
